title: How to Get Lots of Money and Strength Exp in Fable 2

methods.name: How to get lots of money:

steps.headline: Buy as many properties as you can or stalls as you can, the more you buy the bigger amount of money you get back.
steps.description: On each house or stall adjust the prices to 100% so they are all maxed out.

steps.headline: If you are on Xbox live then disconnect the adapter at the back.
steps.description: Now save your game and quit. Go to your system settings on your Xbox and go to time/date. Put your clock forward to the furthest it can go which i think is 2025. Save that and go back to you fable 2 game. Make sure your Xbox live adapter is still disconnected.

steps.headline: Continue your story and as your screen loads up you should see lots of money coming through depending on how many properties you bought.
steps.description: You can now connect your Xbox network adapter back in.

steps.headline: Once your connected back to Xbox live your time and date will be restored to the correct time automatically which is good.
To get more money just keep buying more properties and then repeating this process.
steps.description: This method works without the Xbox live but is a bit more complicated.

steps.headline: If you want to get maxed out experience in your physical stat which is how strong and powerful you will be then read on.
If you have done the Xbox live update then you will need to clear your Xbox 360 cache.
steps.description: Look at this website in the tips section below to do this. Okay, now your cache is cleared start up your Xbox again but don't update your Fable 2 game yet.

steps.headline: Buy a house or find one that when you go to sleep in it your physique is increased.
steps.description: There is a house in Bowerstone market that will give you the physical increase when you have slept.

steps.headline: Go to your abilities in the menu and go to physique.
steps.description: Make sure your physique is around 2-4 stars already to make sure this works. I have never tried any less so i am not sure.

steps.headline: Discard the physique ability; it is supposed to take away the star but instead increases your strength.
steps.description: Keep discarding and watch the green orb in the right hand corner keep going up.

text: How to get lots of money: Buy as many properties as you can or stalls as you can, the more you buy the bigger amount of money you get back. On each house or stall adjust the prices to 100% so they are all maxed out. If you are on Xbox live then disconnect the adapter at the back. Now save your game and quit. Go to your system settings on your Xbox and go to time/date. Put your clock forward to the furthest it can go which i think is 2025. Save that and go back to you fable 2 game. Make sure your Xbox live adapter is still disconnected. Continue your story and as your screen loads up you should see lots of money coming through depending on how many properties you bought. You can now connect your Xbox network adapter back in. Once your connected back to Xbox live your time and date will be restored to the correct time automatically which is good.  To get more money just keep buying more properties and then repeating this process. This method works without the Xbox live but is a bit more complicated. Maxed out experience If you want to get maxed out experience in your physical stat which is how strong and powerful you will be then read on.  If you have done the Xbox live update then you will need to clear your Xbox 360 cache. Look at this website in the tips section below to do this. Okay, now your cache is cleared start up your Xbox again but don't update your Fable 2 game yet. Buy a house or find one that when you go to sleep in it your physique is increased. There is a house in Bowerstone market that will give you the physical increase when you have slept. Go to your abilities in the menu and go to physique. Make sure your physique is around 2-4 stars already to make sure this works. I have never tried any less so i am not sure. Discard the physique ability; it is supposed to take away the star but instead increases your strength. Keep discarding and watch the green orb in the right hand corner keep going up.
